footerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for denon/marantz receivers. Possible to add the receivers as TV service, which enables the posibility to use the remote on the receiver and switch inputs with one block in your homekit screen. [homebridge-denon-heos](https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos).

pollInterval.title: Polling interval
pollInterval.description: The state of the receiver is polled every 3 seconds. Change this interval with this value. The value is the interval in seconds.

debugToInfo.title: Print debug log in info log.
debugToInfo.description: Set to true if you wan't to debug the plugin but you don't have access to the debug log.

devices.description: Information on configuring Devices can be found on https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos
devices.title: Devices

port.title: Port
port.description: None for auto detect. Use 80, 8080 or telnet for manual select.

zone.title: Zone
zone.description: Set if you want to use a specific zone.

switchInfoMenu.title: Switch Info/Menu button.
switchInfoMenu.description: This will switch the functionality of the info and the menu button. This will enable the possibility to go to the menu from the remote widget.

inputs.title: List with selectable inputs
inputs.description: The list with used inputs. If you don't know what input ID's are used, go to https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos for more information on retrieving the correct names.

defaultVolume.title: Default volume
defaultVolume.description: This volume will be set when turning on this switch. You can define a different default volume for input. 0 is disabled.

switches.description: Information on configuring Switches can be found on https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos
switches.title: Switches

port.title: Port
port.description: None for auto detect. Use 80, 8080 or telnet for manual select

zone.title: Zone
zone.description: Set if you want to use a specific zone.

inputID.title: Input ID
inputID.description: The list with used inputs. If you don't know what input ID's are used, go to https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos for more information on retrieving the correct names.

pollAllInput.title: Overall power switch
pollAllInput.description: Use as overall receiver power state with 'input ID' as default input when turning on the receiver through this switch.

defaultVolume.title: Default volume
defaultVolume.description: This volume will be set when turning on this switch. You can define a different default volume for every switch. 0 is disabled.

volumeControl.description: Absolute volume control through a lightbulb. The 'volumeLimit' is the maximum volume you can set with this control. Information on configuring Volume Control can be found on https://github.com/Martvvliet/homebridge-denon-heos
volumeControl.title: Volume Control

zone.title: Zone
zone.description: Set if you want to use a specific zone.

volumeAsFan.title: Volume control as fan
volumeAsFan.description: Use a fan to control the absolute volume instead of a lightbulb.

port.title: Port
port.description: None for auto detect. Use 80, 8080 or telnet for manual select

volumeLimit.title: Volume limit
volumeLimit.description: This is the maximum volume you can set with this control
